price: បន្ទាប់មក ការពិតក៏បានលេចឡើង ហើយអ្វីដែលពួក គេបានធ្វើគ្មានប្រសិទ្ធភាពឡើយ។
arabic: فَوَقَعَ ٱلۡحَقُّ وَبَطَلَ مَا كَانُواْ يَعۡمَلُونَ

version.title: Khmer translation
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Khmer, published by Development Society of Muslim Cambodian Society. The second edition was issued in 2012.

meta.transliteration: fawaqaʿa al-ḥaqu wabaṭala mā kānū yaʿmalūna
